name: Petrol / Diesel dispenser/pump type E-20H
description:
Hydraulic
>Positive displacement pump with built-in vortex air.
>Twin-piston meter with integrated pulse generator.
>Two-stage preset valve.
>Black hose manufactured according to EN1360.
>Elaflex ZVA2 nozzle with break-away valve.
>Havy duty design.
>Galvanized steel cladding with polyester powder paint.
>Flow rate 45/80/130 L/min.
>Reduced service cost due to maintenance-friendly construction.

Electronic
EAS1 electronic calculator with:
>Modular design.
>Error logging
>Delivery logging.
>Backup battery.
>Communications protocol suppported by DOMS.
>Backlit LCD display with 6 digits for volume and amount and 4 digits for unit
 price.

Approvals and Certifications for the dispenser
>Metrological approval
>ATEX certificate LOM 07ATEX2011
